abstract: Baseball Roundup; MLB is considering playing exhibition games in Cuba; other MLB news noted.
lead_paragraph: With a thawing in political relations, discussions have taken place, said Tony Clark, the head of the players association.

headline.main: Exhibition Games Seen as Possible for Cuba
headline.print_headline: Exhibition Games Seen as Possible for Cuba

snippet: With a thawing in political relations, discussions have taken place, said Tony Clark, the head of the players association.
